title: Old Possum's Book of Practical Cats
description: Cats! Some are sane, some are mad and some are good and some are bad.Enjoy the show!With all your favourite cats, starring ... Macavity, the Mystery CatMr Mistofelees, the Original Conjuring CatMungojerrie and Rumpelteazerand many more!
author: T.S. Eliot
